name: Turtle Trouble (Nickname064)
description:
IMPORTANT :

for better performance (and RNG), please play any version but the HTML one.

Random number generation is lazier in HTML, and because my game relies a lot on it, it is less fun in HTML.

I left this version fully playable online, as i want as many people as possible to at least see what my game looks like without going through the hassle of downloading it first.

 Please only see this browser version as a demo though.

(Jam voters, please download the game to judge it)

This game was made in less than 3 days, for the Mini Jam 108

The theme was Seaside, and the restriction was "Everything dies in one hit"

Thus, in this fast-paced arcade game, you play as a hungry little sea turtle searching for food. Help her in her quest for survival, but beware of the trash (turtles don't really like eating trash).

Any feedback or comment is welcome, as it will help me improve not only my programming and artistic skills (I made some of the sprites), but also my game designing skills :D
